nodes.text: I am utterly amazed at the ignorance displayed by some of those commenting here.
Samsmom(554): I am utterly amazed at the ignorance displayed by some of those commenting here.
Annot: I am utterly amazed at the ignorance displayed by some of those commenting here.
Allergies are not "perceived"
Samsmom(554): Allergies are not "perceived"
Annot: Allergies are not "perceived"
as Mulder suggests,
Samsmom(554): as Mulder suggests,
Annot: as Mulder suggests,
and it is ridiculous and unrealistic  to suggest that people with severe food allergies "live in a bubble".
Samsmom(554): and it is ridiculous and unrealistic  to suggest that people with severe food allergies "live in a bubble".
Annot: and it is ridiculous and unrealistic  to suggest that people with severe food allergies "live in a bubble".
No one who has an allergy chooses to be in this situation,
Samsmom(554): No one who has an allergy chooses to be in this situation,
Annot: No one who has an allergy chooses to be in this situation,
and walking onto an airplane where peanuts either are being consumed or have been consumed is like playing Russian Roulette.
Samsmom(554): and walking onto an airplane where peanuts either are being consumed or have been consumed is like playing Russian Roulette.
Annot: and walking onto an airplane where peanuts either are being consumed or have been consumed is like playing Russian Roulette.
We are talking about a SNACK ON AN AIRPLANE.
Samsmom(554): We are talking about a SNACK ON AN AIRPLANE.
Annot: We are talking about a SNACK ON AN AIRPLANE.
Can you really be complaining about your rights to eat a snack?!?
Samsmom(554): Can you really be complaining about your rights to eat a snack?!?
Annot: Can you really be complaining about your rights to eat a snack?!?
My son could DIE because you can't forgo a snack for two hours.
Samsmom(554): My son could DIE because you can't forgo a snack for two hours.
Annot: My son could DIE because you can't forgo a snack for two hours.
While we could drive everywhere we need to go for the rest of his life,
Samsmom(554): While we could drive everywhere we need to go for the rest of his life,
Annot: While we could drive everywhere we need to go for the rest of his life,
there may come a time when time constraints force us to fly.
Samsmom(554): there may come a time when time constraints force us to fly.
Annot: there may come a time when time constraints force us to fly.
No matter how much "responsibility we take", we cannot sufficiently protect him if people around us are eating any peanut product.
Samsmom(554): No matter how much "responsibility we take", we cannot sufficiently protect him if people around us are eating any peanut product.
Annot: No matter how much "responsibility we take", we cannot sufficiently protect him if people around us are eating any peanut product.
We always carry an epipen,
Samsmom(554): We always carry an epipen,
Annot: We always carry an epipen,
and feel that should be our responsibility.
Samsmom(554): and feel that should be our responsibility.
Annot: and feel that should be our responsibility.
But, again, that may not be enough to save his life.
Samsmom(554): But, again, that may not be enough to save his life.
Annot: But, again, that may not be enough to save his life.
Those autoinjectors can only buy us 1015 minutes,
Samsmom(554): Those autoinjectors can only buy us 1015 minutes,
Annot: Those autoinjectors can only buy us 1015 minutes,
barely enough time for a plane to request an emergency landing site.
Samsmom(554): barely enough time for a plane to request an emergency landing site.
Annot: barely enough time for a plane to request an emergency landing site.
He would be dead before we taxied to the gate.
Samsmom(554): He would be dead before we taxied to the gate.
Annot: He would be dead before we taxied to the gate.
FOR A SNACK!!
Samsmom(554): FOR A SNACK!!
Annot: FOR A SNACK!!
An outright ban should be in place.
Samsmom(554): An outright ban should be in place.
Annot: An outright ban should be in place.
Apparently Samsmom is the ignorant one.
Mulder(533): Apparently Samsmom is the ignorant one.
Annot: Apparently Samsmom is the ignorant one.
She attacks what she clearly does not understand.
Mulder(533): She attacks what she clearly does not understand.
Annot: She attacks what she clearly does not understand.
If her child has a true peanut allergy that is so severe, he shouldn't be flying,
Mulder(533): If her child has a true peanut allergy that is so severe, he shouldn't be flying,
Annot: If her child has a true peanut allergy that is so severe, he shouldn't be flying,
since her argument is that any contact with peanut dust or oil would cause anaphylactic shock.
Mulder(533): since her argument is that any contact with peanut dust or oil would cause anaphylactic shock.
Annot: since her argument is that any contact with peanut dust or oil would cause anaphylactic shock.
Since that possibility is very real even outside an airline cabin,
Mulder(533): Since that possibility is very real even outside an airline cabin,
Annot: Since that possibility is very real even outside an airline cabin,
she's making her own argument for living in a bubble.
Mulder(533): she's making her own argument for living in a bubble.
Annot: she's making her own argument for living in a bubble.
Facts are stubborn things,
Mulder(533): Facts are stubborn things,
Annot: Facts are stubborn things,
and one of those facts is that the air onboard an airliner is cleaner than in most public buildings,
Mulder(533): and one of those facts is that the air onboard an airliner is cleaner than in most public buildings,
Annot: and one of those facts is that the air onboard an airliner is cleaner than in most public buildings,
so there's very little, if any, real risk involved in flying on a jet where peanuts have been consumed before or are even being served now.
Mulder(533): so there's very little, if any, real risk involved in flying on a jet where peanuts have been consumed before or are even being served now.
Annot: so there's very little, if any, real risk involved in flying on a jet where peanuts have been consumed before or are even being served now.
Another stubborn fact is that you can be desensitized to peanut allergies,
Mulder(533): Another stubborn fact is that you can be desensitized to peanut allergies,
Annot: Another stubborn fact is that you can be desensitized to peanut allergies,
but if you're unwilling to do it, don't blame others for not bending to your petty fears.
Mulder(533): but if you're unwilling to do it, don't blame others for not bending to your petty fears.
Annot: but if you're unwilling to do it, don't blame others for not bending to your petty fears.
Nobody has studied this subject,
Mulder(533): Nobody has studied this subject,
Annot: Nobody has studied this subject,
so there's no hard data.
Mulder(533): so there's no hard data.
Annot: so there's no hard data.
But we do know that the air onboard an airliner is much cleaner than people think.
Mulder(533): But we do know that the air onboard an airliner is much cleaner than people think.
Annot: But we do know that the air onboard an airliner is much cleaner than people think.
Only one confirmed death onboard an airliner has been reported,
Mulder(533): Only one confirmed death onboard an airliner has been reported,
Annot: Only one confirmed death onboard an airliner has been reported,
but it may have been as far back as 1998,
Mulder(533): but it may have been as far back as 1998,
Annot: but it may have been as far back as 1998,
and it was an Eastern European airline.
Mulder(533): and it was an Eastern European airline.
Annot: and it was an Eastern European airline.
Peanut allergens are indeed present in the recirculated air in the aircraft cabin.
Antanagoge(598): Peanut allergens are indeed present in the recirculated air in the aircraft cabin.
Annot: Peanut allergens are indeed present in the recirculated air in the aircraft cabin.

This study, "Recovery of peanut allergens from ventilation filters of commercial airliners," ? conducted "to help address whether peanutsensitive travelers are exposed to peanut aeroallergans during airline flights on which peanuts are served" ? resulted in the conclusion that "that peanut allergens can be eluted from ventilation system filters in commercial airliners. The most likely source of these allergens are the peanuts served during flights." ?

Antanagoge(598): This study, "Recovery of peanut allergens from ventilation filters of commercial airliners," ? conducted "to help address whether peanutsensitive travelers are exposed to peanut aeroallergans during airline flights on which peanuts are served" ? resulted in the conclusion that "that peanut allergens can be eluted from ventilation system filters in commercial airliners. The most likely source of these allergens are the peanuts served during flights." ?

Annot: This study, "Recovery of peanut allergens from ventilation filters of commercial airliners," ? conducted "to help address whether peanutsensitive travelers are exposed to peanut aeroallergans during airline flights on which peanuts are served" ? resulted in the conclusion that "that peanut allergens can be eluted from ventilation system filters in commercial airliners. The most likely source of these allergens are the peanuts served during flights." ?
http://download.journals.elsevierhealth.com/pdfs/journals/00916749/PIIS0091674996811791.pdf
Antanagoge(598): http://download.journals.elsevierhealth.com/pdfs/journals/00916749/PIIS0091674996811791.pdf
Annot: http://download.journals.elsevierhealth.com/pdfs/journals/00916749/PIIS0091674996811791.pdf
Mulder, you seem to have a lot of knowledge on the subject of airlines and peanut allergies?
TFunke(593): Mulder, you seem to have a lot of knowledge on the subject of airlines and peanut allergies?
Annot: Mulder, you seem to have a lot of knowledge on the subject of airlines and peanut allergies?
Are you a researcher or doctor of some sort?
TFunke(593): Are you a researcher or doctor of some sort?
Annot: Are you a researcher or doctor of some sort?
No, I'm just an allergy sufferer
Mulder(533): No, I'm just an allergy sufferer
Annot: No, I'm just an allergy sufferer
(but not to peanuts or tree nuts)
Mulder(533): (but not to peanuts or tree nuts)
Annot: (but not to peanuts or tree nuts)
like most of the population.
Mulder(533): like most of the population.
Annot: like most of the population.
The difference is that I actually know a good number of people in the airline industry as well as reading lots of research papers on the subject of peanut allergies.
Mulder(533): The difference is that I actually know a good number of people in the airline industry as well as reading lots of research papers on the subject of peanut allergies.
Annot: The difference is that I actually know a good number of people in the airline industry as well as reading lots of research papers on the subject of peanut allergies.
I tire of the constant harping that peanut allergies are on the rise,
Mulder(533): I tire of the constant harping that peanut allergies are on the rise,
Annot: I tire of the constant harping that peanut allergies are on the rise,
when there is no scientific data to back it up.
Mulder(533): when there is no scientific data to back it up.
Annot: when there is no scientific data to back it up.
I do believe that people need to educate themselves as to what is a real allergy,
Mulder(533): I do believe that people need to educate themselves as to what is a real allergy,
Annot: I do believe that people need to educate themselves as to what is a real allergy,
rather than simply an adverse reaction to a particular food.
Mulder(533): rather than simply an adverse reaction to a particular food.
Annot: rather than simply an adverse reaction to a particular food.
Far too often, people (especially parents) quickly label an adverse reaction as an allergy, without testing them to be certain.
Mulder(533): Far too often, people (especially parents) quickly label an adverse reaction as an allergy, without testing them to be certain.
Annot: Far too often, people (especially parents) quickly label an adverse reaction as an allergy, without testing them to be certain.
Then they hammer away at the child that they can't have certain foods or have to be REALLY CAREFUL or they'll die.
Mulder(533): Then they hammer away at the child that they can't have certain foods or have to be REALLY CAREFUL or they'll die.
Annot: Then they hammer away at the child that they can't have certain foods or have to be REALLY CAREFUL or they'll die.
That creates needless anxiety for the child
Mulder(533): That creates needless anxiety for the child
Annot: That creates needless anxiety for the child
and causes a great deal of psychological damage to them.
Mulder(533): and causes a great deal of psychological damage to them.
Annot: and causes a great deal of psychological damage to them.
So true!
howie(351): So true!
Annot: So true!
I see this all the time.
howie(351): I see this all the time.
Annot: I see this all the time.
They try to ban peanuts at school because some over anxious mom saw something on TV about food allergies and that became her kids affliction du jour.
howie(351): They try to ban peanuts at school because some over anxious mom saw something on TV about food allergies and that became her kids affliction du jour.
Annot: They try to ban peanuts at school because some over anxious mom saw something on TV about food allergies and that became her kids affliction du jour.
Peanuts are harmless to 99.99999% of humans.
howie(351): Peanuts are harmless to 99.99999% of humans.
Annot: Peanuts are harmless to 99.99999% of humans.
The 3 living humans who are actually in danger just need to stay in a bubble and leave the rest of us in peace.
howie(351): The 3 living humans who are actually in danger just need to stay in a bubble and leave the rest of us in peace.
Annot: The 3 living humans who are actually in danger just need to stay in a bubble and leave the rest of us in peace.
There is no indication that Mulder is qualified to make reliable claims on the subject of allergies.
Antanagoge(598): There is no indication that Mulder is qualified to make reliable claims on the subject of allergies.
Annot: There is no indication that Mulder is qualified to make reliable claims on the subject of allergies.
He is not an expert in this context.
Antanagoge(598): He is not an expert in this context.
Annot: He is not an expert in this context.
And the fact that an unqualified person makes a claim does not provide any rational reason to accept the claim as true.
Antanagoge(598): And the fact that an unqualified person makes a claim does not provide any rational reason to accept the claim as true.
Annot: And the fact that an unqualified person makes a claim does not provide any rational reason to accept the claim as true.

There is adequate agreement among real allergy experts that "the most practical solution to reduce the risk of an allergic reaction to peanuts would be to simply discontinue serving packaged peanut snacks on all flights covered by the DOT."

Antanagoge(598): There is adequate agreement among real allergy experts that "the most practical solution to reduce the risk of an allergic reaction to peanuts would be to simply discontinue serving packaged peanut snacks on all flights covered by the DOT."

Annot: There is adequate agreement among real allergy experts that "the most practical solution to reduce the risk of an allergic reaction to peanuts would be to simply discontinue serving packaged peanut snacks on all flights covered by the DOT."
See the statement of the Medical Advisory Board of the Food Allergy & Anaphylaxis Network at
Antanagoge(598): See the statement of the Medical Advisory Board of the Food Allergy & Anaphylaxis Network at
Annot: See the statement of the Medical Advisory Board of the Food Allergy & Anaphylaxis Network at
http://www.foodallergy.org/page/dotproposal.
Antanagoge(598): http://www.foodallergy.org/page/dotproposal.
Annot: http://www.foodallergy.org/page/dotproposal.
Mulder's statement is both meanspirited and inaccurate.
Antanagoge(598): Mulder's statement is both meanspirited and inaccurate.
Annot: Mulder's statement is both meanspirited and inaccurate.
There is currently NO safe effective desensitization for peanut allergy (or any other food allergy) available.
Antanagoge(598): There is currently NO safe effective desensitization for peanut allergy (or any other food allergy) available.
Annot: There is currently NO safe effective desensitization for peanut allergy (or any other food allergy) available.
There is currently No immunotherapy to lower the risk of anaphylactic reactions and cause people to outgrow their allergy.
Antanagoge(598): There is currently No immunotherapy to lower the risk of anaphylactic reactions and cause people to outgrow their allergy.
Annot: There is currently No immunotherapy to lower the risk of anaphylactic reactions and cause people to outgrow their allergy.
Yes, studies are underway which could potentially lead to new therapies in the future,
Antanagoge(598): Yes, studies are underway which could potentially lead to new therapies in the future,
Annot: Yes, studies are underway which could potentially lead to new therapies in the future,
but NO desensitization treatment presently exists.
Antanagoge(598): but NO desensitization treatment presently exists.
Annot: but NO desensitization treatment presently exists.
Any attempts to personally undertake this are strongly cautioned against by all real authorities on the subject.
Antanagoge(598): Any attempts to personally undertake this are strongly cautioned against by all real authorities on the subject.
Annot: Any attempts to personally undertake this are strongly cautioned against by all real authorities on the subject.
In spite of the growing occurrence of food allergies in the U.S. and their danger to sufferers, there presently are NO medications to cure or control food allergies.
Antanagoge(598): In spite of the growing occurrence of food allergies in the U.S. and their danger to sufferers, there presently are NO medications to cure or control food allergies.
Annot: In spite of the growing occurrence of food allergies in the U.S. and their danger to sufferers, there presently are NO medications to cure or control food allergies.
Strict avoidance of the allergenic food is the ONLY way to avoid a reaction.
Antanagoge(598): Strict avoidance of the allergenic food is the ONLY way to avoid a reaction.
Annot: Strict avoidance of the allergenic food is the ONLY way to avoid a reaction.
Mulder begs the very question at stake
Antanagoge(598): Mulder begs the very question at stake
Annot: Mulder begs the very question at stake
and insults a mother in the process.
Antanagoge(598): and insults a mother in the process.
Annot: and insults a mother in the process.
If peanuts were discontinued on flights, then even her severely peanutallergic child could fly.
Antanagoge(598): If peanuts were discontinued on flights, then even her severely peanutallergic child could fly.
Annot: If peanuts were discontinued on flights, then even her severely peanutallergic child could fly.
